content: I like the game, but I find that "household expenses" seems a bit arbitrary. It would be awesome if there were a breakdown of what contributes to it.
I love this game but theres a gitch where it shows something like nice goats you got then it crashes
Gets boring, fun at first, then turns into the game you forgot about wasting space.
Its a great game. It gets a little repetitive. I'm looking forward to more updates with more content and things to do.
Could be better but you have to pay absurd amounts of money for every little action. And the prices only go up.

Roman bitlife. Interesting concept but because of poor inheritance mechanics, incredibly wild rng, and very slow progression it can feel like wheel spinning with little interaction and few options. I'll likely give it a better review with more updates but as is it's kinda boring with little to do.
So are you gonna add the military thing to the game or should I just move on. Good game I hope you can release more updated.

Update: As of right now, the issue with the game crashing when a certain event pops up has been fixed!! Apparently the latest game update did fix it, but I did have to delete the app and reinstall it. And, when I reinstalled all was fixed and my previous game data was saved!! This is an awesome game, so glad the issue was taken care of!!
replyContent: The latest release v1.3.6 fixes this without having to reset your game. In v1.3.5 we'd recommend you avoid this event by choosing the don't steal option (only one of the several outcomes in that event leads to this crash) Truly sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for your patronage!

content: Fun game to waste time with!

Used to love this game but now it's almost impossible to play and crashes whenever I get the "Nice animals you have there" event. Usually when this happens you can reset and keep playing but not always. Also they need to deal with some gross historical inaccuracies, add a patron/client system, allow you to purchase slaves, and add more historical events and have an actual ending. Until they fix the bugs I recommend you don't buy it. I'm using version 1.3.7 on Android.
replyContent: Really sorry you've run into this. It should not be occurring on v1.3.7, this was a relatively rare issue exclusive to v1.3.5. Could you please confirm that it crashed for you on v1.3.7? Also we do try to uphold history where possible, please write to us with any inaccuracies on that part and we'll try to take care of them in upcoming releases. Thx

content: Goes nowhere

If you add military and wars and like a map to conquer more random events and basically turn this into a roman Crusader Kings game OMG this would be the best game ever like PLEASE Dev PLEASE keep with this game and improving and adding to it. Rival Houses, intrigue, merchants, barbarians, anything creative and fun. more traits genes more more more please literally an awesome game but you could seriously have a masterpiece with some work. Ill pay more for it!!! I love it thanks for responding
replyContent: Thank you so much! We do eventually want to get there, though not turning into a grand strategy game overall. Please join us on our discord and help shape the game's future. Thank you once again for your patronage!

content: I love this game, it has some very interesting features, especially with how your traits can influence the outcome of events. The reason why I rated it three stars instead of five is that there is an event where you can steal a rival families animal that crashes the game and will not go away unless you uninstall the game.
replyContent: This has been fixed in the latest release v1.3.6 and your game will continue to work without having to reset even if you ran into this crash before. Until you're able to update, I'd recommend choosing not to steal on that event. Really sorry for the inconvenience, and thank you for your patronage and kind words!

content: Gave it a 5 stars, but I had to edit it back after the update. The time for the events to pop up is so slow, when I pressed the next month button about 1 sec per tap, it skipped every single one of the events, including my children going to school. So now I ended up with dumb kids with no education. I even set "automatically open" option up for education. Biggest problem is your daughters. They're so useless in this game, with no benefits except marrying them off so we stop getting penalty.

I love this game. However the fact that money is capped causing me to continuously keep having thousands disapear from my bank after earning it fairly is seriously obnoxious and makes me stop playing often.
replyContent: v1.3.6 changes this so that money over your stewardship based cash limit is only pilfered over time instead of being lost immediately (You can see your cash limit by tapping the indicator on top). Thank you for your patronage!

content: Great game

The developers really need to make sure the percentages of doing well in an event is correct I had a 99% chance of doing well and I lost an arm. The next year I had a 95% chance of doing well and I brought shame to my family. The final year I had a 97% chance of doing well and I lose a damn leg. WTH so yea be careful of the percentages because they are VERY inaccurate
replyContent: This has been corrected and the system has been replaced in v1.3.5

content: Fun game. Very addictive. Only downside is constant popups for non-optionals. Why do I have to click to pay the tax everytime if I don't have a choice but to pay it? It make more sense to deduct the money automatically IMO.
Awesome game! was a lot of fun!
Love this game. Don't have much to say about it besides it's great. Main complaint is that it's pretty annoying having to go to different screens to buy different properties. Just put them together.

This game is one of my favorites. There are some small errors I find annoying i.e. when I get large sums of inheritance it shows up but then disappears just as fast as it was given. I enjoy the historical accuracy (there are a few things that don't particularly match but it's accurate for the most part. Overall I reccomend playing it.
Its great. Add a military feature and it will easily be a 5 star game.
I love the game I just want a bit more content and if you have a large family the game can get pretty slow.
Love it Great Game

Excellent concept and very good execution. Would be good to add in more late game events such as military campaigns for military tribunes, praetors, and consuls. Also some kind of activities using the Senate or the Tribune of the Plebs to alter the legal and economic landscape would be good. Would also be cool to add in various religious posts that could be competed for. Also automating some tedious tasks like tracking education in a large family or property as stewardship shift via policies.
Grand
Good concept but lacking real depth. More control over interactions and jobs would be nice. Controls didn't play nice with my phone either (Google Pixel)
replyContent: Could you please share more details on the issue with the controls, either via Discord or email? We'd like to get things working great for you as soon as we can, and in the next release if possible. Thank you for your patronage and really sorry it didn't work as well as expected

content: It was good but I asked for a refund but I never got it
replyContent: I think Google restricts the time since purchase where you can get a refund. Email us your order info and we'll try it on our end or better yet ping us on Discord and we'll do our best to help you have even more fun with your purchase. We're also coming up with several new features and content updates soon as we've done since release

content: After playing it so much, events repeat year after years. I've played through about 15k years and never really got past pleb lvl 1.... I don't see how one gets into the military or govt without playing on sandbox mode or easy
replyContent: It is definitely very doable, plase go through this guide https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1993435956 and ping me via email or Discord and several friendly players amd I will gladly help you get through and make the most out of your purchase. Thank you for your patronage!

content: I would have given this game a 5 but there are issues with the game play that make the game tedious and often annoying. The calibration of stats is not always accurate.
replyContent: That sounds like a bug, could you please share details via email at rome@thestartupengine.net or Discord? Thank you very much for your patronage and for writing in!

content: Just not enough to warrant the price. I wish there was more to do. The same random events happen time and time again and it just kind of repeats forever. Disappointing game to say the least.

Very fun game! I definitely enjoyed the open-endedness of it all. Managing large families can be a challenge though and my one criticism would be that you lose so much of your wealrh during every generational shift. Even if you manage to keep yourself an only child you seem to lose half your wealth as if you were splitting it with a sibling. That didn't make much sense and I wish there was more transparency around that.
replyContent: Really glad you enjoyed it. Regarding the property split when you inherited as an only child, it sounds like a bug and it would really help if you could share more details via Discord or email. We'll see if we can show an inheritance breakdown somewhere. Thank you for your patronage and for writing in!

content: Great game. Love the game and the histort and culture points . i feel like this will be going place .5 bucks and keeps me entertain so no complaints. Looking forward to future updates. Ps to those saying its hard..i made it to consul of the republic.just keep trying. Little tip have you oldest marry a old woman so they cant have child. Keeps cost down
Educational value here is higher than entertainment value.
Can I get a refund, please
I didn't like this game

It is a very good idea, but the execution isnt that good. There is barely anything to do besides buy property and the occasional random event(i personely got the same events over and over.). It would really benefit the game if you could do more outside of random events. And some of the job names are in Latin and theres no translation or even a description of any job, a job description for the jobs with latin names would be really helpful.
Worth the money. Spent all of yesterday playing.

Pretty good BUT a few major issues that make it not worth $5 YET, maybe $3 in current form. No clear methodology for increasing max amount of land. Arbitrary money caps that just discards money received over the undefined and arbitrary money max. last issue is there is no clear end game, not even a pop up that says "congrats you did it" Also I'd like to suggest some sort of Imperium option like if you get enough money and renown you can declare yourself Caesar

So far, this game has been great. From roman lore to management to your family and otherwise the gameplay as a whole. Although it could use some tweaks, such as a tutorial on the stats especially which ones matter in certain events, to possibly more micromanagement in terms of managing your family, stat improvements, and possibly property. And I cant remember the user on top of my head, but an encyclopedia on Roman lore would be a great addition to the gam for both education and immersion.
I only give 4 stars instead of 5 because it is honestly a great game unless if you get barred from the ludi and then you have the problem of not being able to make any money at all
I wish there was an instance where Rome went to war and you had to fight, or that you could enlist in the army.
replyContent:
Coming soon :)
Please share your ideas on Discord to help shape this.
Thank you for your patronage and for writing in!

content: Lost a lot of time on this game, would love more events, but the creator seems to be adding things steadily. Buy this game **EDIT** 03/12/20 after updating my s9 my entire save data was deleted. Still love the game, just wanted to give a heads up!

Will buy again when a decent bit of features are added, feels like you need more options and controls. Would love to see things like the older son getting the bigger part of the inheritance, or some type of backstabbing etc etc idk just more features. Also please make the family chart more clear

I'm updating my review as the game has changed DRAMATICALLY from when I reviewed it previously. The developers have taken on board so much of the feedback offered that it's truly impressive, including a suggestion that I made. The game feels more rich, more fun, and the small touches and personal events make it all the more enjoyable. I was delighted when I got an event related to my daughter's trait, a moment that prompted this update. Highly recommend it, and keep going guys
replyContent: Thank you for your patronage and input. Thanks to it, we have added flavor text showing the cause of death in the latest version. We are continuing to work on and improve the game, Please do feel free to share more feedback and ideas via email at rome@thestartupengine.net . Thank you!

content: If you lose stewardship there should be a notification that informs you to sell property over the limit. Also when you spend 20k to educate your kid at 250 a month and have it auto cancel? I overall can appreciate this game but it frustrates me more than the $5 price on the game. Good concept but you have a lot of work to make it more enjoyable to play. Overall 3/5. This game is worth a dollar or two at most in it's current state.
replyContent: The first option in the debt modal allows you to stop spending on education, it's likely you're tapping that. The first bad event that happens when you're well over your stewardship limit is always a revenue malus one acting as a kind of a warning before you stand to lose property. We're considering a sell all over limit button in the future

content: It isn't a bad game by any stretch, but it definitely does need some work. For instance, I have noticed a spelling error here and there, among some very minor bugs. The main issue, however, is the lack of content/things to do. I very regularly find myself simply smashing the time progression button just so I can get to events like Saturnalia and whatnot. Needs more activities for sure, and maybe even a compendium of all the Roman lore the game offers you to make it more educational.
replyContent: Thank you for your patronage and for writing in. We've been continuing to improve and add content to the game and will add more random events going forward. Please do share any bugs and errors via email or Discord and we'll get them fixed in the next release. (One fun game play mode to try is to use autoplay and play long term across generations)

content: Had to uninstall and reinstall due to bugs. The ladies were having multiple children every month and I eventually I couldn't click anything or move to the next month. Also could not reset in settings
replyContent: Really sorry this happened. We had patched this very issue in the latest release V1.3.3, could you please check your settings screen in-game and tell me if you ran into the issue on this version?  Kindly email rome@thestartupengine.net or message us via Discord and we'll get it resolved at the earliest. Thank you very much for your patronage!

content: I love Roman history and dynasty building games so this is just amazing! I have put so much time into it and it still keeps me entertained!

I can't believe I wasted 5 bucks on this turd. I actually like the game, but simply put it makes no sense why household spending continues to rise rapidly throughout the game way faster than it's even possible to increase income, on top of this you have to deal with things like paying for schooling or apprenticeship for your children which takes 3 years all the while dragging down your income dramatically while spending continues to rise for some f****** unknown reason.
replyContent: Sorry it didn't feel fun. Please just hang in there, it does get easier going forward. If it's too painful I would recommend starting over in the Easy or Sandbox modes. Kindly also see this guide: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1993435956 Please also feel free to reach out via Discord or Email with any questions/suggestions

content: This game can be very fun going through all the events. But can also be very frustrating espcially when you cant control on how many kids you can have. Because they can just bankrupt you.
replyContent: Sorry the experience didn't feel enjoyable. Going into debt for a bit is a common experience in the game but you will almost always bounce back - the game has multiple systems that ensures this. Please ping us on Discord or email and I'd be very happy to help. We've also balanced things a bit around this in the latest release v1.3.3. Thank you

content: Good but needs more content. It cam get boring in a few hours with content slowly trickling in.
The game is challenging but fun! Would like to see an update that includes the ability to ascend even further up the rungs of Roman society, perhaps even emperor!
Thanks for the response, I see exactly what I was doing now. I really enjoy this game. Thank you for being helpful and keep the updates coming. Thanks :)
replyContent: The first option in the debt event is to stop spending on education, it is quite likely that you may have tapped that. Please write to us via email or Discord if that's not the case. Thank you very much for your patronage!

content: Its a good game just that it gets boring after less then a couple of weeks
Didn't get the full experience I paid for even when it was fully updated. Try harder next time pls.
replyContent: Could you please elaborate and tell us what you felt was missing either via email or on Discord so that we can improve the experience going forward? Thank you for your patronage and for writing in

content: Love this game absolutely love it I say this about very few games but this is amazing. You should add different ranked citizen types like plebian to another one all the way up to like something dont know what I'm saying but yeah

Great game, but hard to keep up with finances. I'll have plenty of property to bring in revenue, everything is going great, nothing changes at all. Then suddenly, I go from making 50+ a month to -40. This is a very frustrating part of the game since I would like to stay away from the easy mode. I just dont get where the money goes. 🤷🏽‍♀️

Entertaining Education I was skeptical at first about getting this but after giving it a chance I am hooked it seems like there would be a learning curve and a bit of an imagination, some knowledge of history this is a great game with excellent replayability. Some helpful ideas there should be a speed option for auto play it feels like it goes far to fast and the manual way feels far too slow.

They really should have added a small trial period so you dont waste $5. No discernible way to lower your characters stress which they can die of for some reason and every time someone dies you're next character is again at the lowest rank it's impossible to move up. Though I do enjoy the random events Fun game in concept poor execution.
Game is fun for a few hours until you realize everything is RNG and it's impossible to do well.
Gets kind of stale. In its current state, it's not worth 5 dollars.

Has so much potential but is not worth it yet. Needs more content or a price drop. The final nail in the coffin for me was when my prodigy son died in a freak accident after I spent thousands of gold to educate him.

So the game used to be fun... but tbh idk what happened with the expenses... but its WAY too hard to keep up with the increase of household expenses. It's not enough time to make your revenue go up tbh. And also we need more descriptions for what were looking at. There should be a manual in the settings.
replyContent: We'd love to improve, could you please write to us on Discord or Email about the kind of descriptions you're referring to and also any ideas on what should be on the manual. We haven't changed the way household expenses work in quite a while (rising linearly with wealth and as kids grow up) - maybe try the Easy mode? Thank you for your patronage!

content: This game is worth the cost. I've many hours on this game. I have learned a lot about roman culture and ways. I've enjoy it a lot.
This is really fun and no ads.
When in sandbox mode, the game will "forget" it is in sandbox, and you will start to bleed money.
replyContent: Sorry you ran into this. We've fixed this bug for the next release, for now closing and reopening the game will put you back at Infinity. Thank you for your patronage!

content: This is honestly the only mobile game I'd rate as a 10/10. It's free and and there is no pressure to support, but it totally stands on and surpasses the playing field of other life sims. It offers a truly unique experience as well as being a bit educational regarding the ins and outs of roman life. I love this game and its constantly being improved upon. Please download and try the game and support the creator because they deserve it for everything they put into this.
Really fun once you figure it out don't expect to make money right away but in the long run you'll make tons

I'd give it 5 stars, but the game makes you fail elections almost every time and it gets awfully irritating. I'd love to see more options while campaigning rather than only three options. Also, you should add a census feature.
Frustrating but fun clicker

I enjoy the game every much. The detail of it is awesome. Only thing is I got to 610 A.U.C and no wars have happened, there are achievements for it. That is the only thing preventing a 5 star with me.
Extremely fun, frustratingly difficult to progress
I absolutely love this game! It reminds me of Ck2. I hope you made a game like this but set in medieval Europe instead. Tho the money system is kinda hard but it adds challenge.

You guys are all explaining how u guys go broke and stuff and at first I thought my people were gonna be in debt forever cuz I owed 100k. However, you will get inheritance from dead family members and buy a lot of farms cuz u make lots of money. You'll soon get millions and next generation you'll also get millions and you'll continue to grow the money and get more inheritance so once you play enough you'll just stay rich.

It's a lovely game. There is a bit of a struggle at the beginning but once you get into the Senate, things start to look up. I found the discord to be very helpful. I love the fact that there are no ads. I recommend it for a neat way to pass time. It's a rather enjoyable experience :) Keep up the good work :)
replyContent: Thank you very much, just hang in there for a bit, it will get easier as you go forward, even if you run up debts for a bit (remember there's no game over). You can always discuss strategies or write to us on Discord or via email. Thank you for your patronage!

content: Game will make you want to pull your hair out at times. For example after I tried to participate in a horse race the game decided to tell me that my character cheated and got caught (without a decision from me) so I lost all my money and had to sell off half of my possessions to repay the debt and got a cheating character modifier which reduced the gold I earned from all of my my buildings leading to a negative monthly gold gain which lead to many other obstacles. Lost hours of progress.
Its pretty fun but is kinda annoying to have no control over how many kids you have especially if you build up 20k worth of property just to have it drop to 2k when I start as the next person.
Yeah game is Bugged you start losing money out of nowhere
replyContent: Really sorry you ran into this. Could you please write to rome@thestartupengine.net (or on Discord) with some info on when and how this happened? Was it rapidly rising household costs? Thank you for your patronage, we'd like to get things working for you at the earliest

content: Needs a detailed income page, went from raking in cash every month to suddenly in a constant huge deficit that ruined my run and couldn't be climbed out of no matter what I did with no explanation as to why my income suddenly nosedived
replyContent: Thank you for your patronage and for writing this. Could you please check the property screen and let me know where the deficit stems from? Was it education costs or rising household expenses? Please ping us either via email or Discord. We are going to have a visible breakdown on property revenue modifiers in an upcoming release. Thank you

content: Gets a little repetitive but other than that pretty decent game

Generally Positive - should be a way to limit birthrate, or desire for children, or stay unmarried, or same sex relationships or a better way to just focus how wealth is inherited. Should have a Military leader Legion or Armada career path. Should have a "mini game" goal set, more than just the get elected senator, & better way to set stats. +s ... easy to grasp, nice story for each festival, good Roman research -s ... expenses are high to start, hard to focus hereditary monies and property.

No matter how much property I attain, my household expenses are insanely high. Rocketing over my property incomes, even though most of my money goes into property. Dont fall for the illusion that property is a stable and idle way to make money, it's almost useless. Otherwise it's kinda fun, but its infuriating how exhorbantly high household expenses are, and they wont even show you why. Needs alot more information.
Make it where i can be a girl
The game is bugged. You randomly lose huge amounts of money for no reason straight after you get any inheritance.
replyContent: It seems likely that this is because you're going over your stewardship based cash holding limit that you can see by tapping on the cash indicator on top. Please write to us at rome@thestartupengine.net or ping us on Discord in case that it's not or for further clarification. Thank you for your patronage!

content: They should do this again but with a Monarchy

Frustrating as hell the lack of control over how many children and when I want them is annoying. My heir also doesn't get all the property I built up instead it is separated and given to those idiots that my character keep birthing out from class 1 to class V instantly. Definitely not what I was expecting!!! I WANT A REFUND HOW CAN I PAY SO MUCH MONEY FOR SOMETHING LIKE THIS!!! GIVE ME A REFUND!! Edit: At the very least they have good customer service
Finally a mobile dynasty sim worth playing. It could use a little more customization but otherwise 5/5.
The only way to make a lot of money (which is nearly impossible when you're an equitte ) is to gamble
Love the different options and multi generation changes. Very creative and lots of replayability.
Excellent Game!!! Love it, shockingly worth the $4.99!!
Update has made the game really good! Love the graphic changes, this game is really coming together well, and it's been enjoyable to watch the developer make the game better and better :).

I did not expect this game to keep me this invested and entertained! I found that I started to care less about the individual paterfamilias and looked more at the bigger picture of my entire family. That's a real fun game I will be playing for a long time. Thanks for the update as well. The new icons are much appreciated.

The game is really fun. But when my character died from old age all of the property was separated. It kinda threw the whole game off balance. I hope u would consider adding an inheritance update. It would make the game much more fun and probably improve more people's experiences.

I love this game and I highly recommend it. The developers are very fast at fixing bugs and releasing improvements! I've spent a lot of time in this game, and the updates make it so the game gets new things at just about the same time I've adapted to the old ones. It's great!
Regular updates, easy game. Wish there was more to do besides events and going to school.
Please let us grow a beard in the game
How did you guys make this

It is a very good game! Keeps me busy for hours. I do wish that statistics on certain actions were more clear. And it would be nice to have a full list of events and the benefits they have on gameplay. Otherwise good game!

Love this game, one of the best in its genre. It has high replay value, since every game is a bit different. The developer is also constantly tweaking stuff and adding updates. I suggest adding an option for a couple to stop having kids at some point, an option to disinherit some of your children and an event that lets you increase a chosen attribute for some gold.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your patronage, kind words and feedback. We have just released v1.2.43 with a little better balancing around illness, birth-rates & mortality and a few tweaks to improve game performance, please let us know how it feels: rome@thestartupengine.net, Also I'd love to hear your ideas on better inheritance and sibling stats control

content: I want to become an emperor
replyContent: Declaring yourself "Princeps Senatus" is definitely on our roadmap but a little down the road after we have finished fleshing out more of the politics, expansion, etc in the republican period, for now you'll have to content yourself with becoming Consul (and soon dictator ;) Thank you for your patronage and feedback!

content: I love this game I am practically addicted to it

It got boring really quickly. Seems like the stats don't really do much, and the events get old after a while. I also don't like how apprenticeship scales with your class, and still provides more or less the same benefits. There is a sense of progression for a while, but even in easy mode, the game is too tough.
Great game

Nice game. Sometimes hard to get by, eventough you got quite a bit of property. It is enoying that property's are devided between sons. It cost me my game.. And sometimes death rates are very high. And that also cost me 2 games...
I think when your heir reaches the age of marriage i think you should have the option of giving them your stuff

I love this game. However, id love for some unique events to trigger. Like a murder in the family, assassination, war. And maybe in the future, have some interface for the Senate. This game has unlimited potential and maybe I'm thinking of CK2 but I see where this game can go. Also still glitches.
After the update I can't even play anymore. It's just a blank white screen when I open the app.
replyContent: Really sorry this happened, an older version had a bugged out burning Insule event which caused game data to be corrupted & the game to crash after a while. It should work filne if you upgrade to v1.2.40  & clear all app data, please email us at rome@thestartupengine.net in case it doesn't resolve it for you. Thank you very much for your patronage

content: Disappointing and limited game for the price
The game overall is very good and facilitates lots of imaginative thoughts, like any good RPG would. Developers are great and respond to you litrrally in a matter of hours. Thanks for the bug fix!
replyContent: Really sorry for the bugged experience, we have just released a hotfix v1.2.40 for fixing the event. Thank you very much for your patronage and I'm really glad you're enjoying the game otherwise

content: Great interesting game. I think as this current build, there is some balance issues on the progression of class. The total value of property is not proportional to the class, even if the kids graduate and contribute to the income. In one my game, I only had 8 low level farms yet I was on class 3 already. It really is hard to sustain with that amount given that for class 3, it is already expensive relative to amount of income. I think it will be more manageable if I am still on class 4.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your patronage and feedback. The class property requirement levels are set to match the historical levels Romans used. We are planning an update for better representing the household costs and to give players more control with options to choose to skimp on them at the cost of prestige/health and are open to ideas

content: Fun for the first hour. Not much to do for trading in game. Not much too do in game. You buy things to make revnue and raise your class level. When raising to another class not much really happens. You grind just to buy land and get in a higher class. Random events have effects with each month. Sacrifice livestock for better blessings and reputation. Growing a family can be hard at first since it eats revenue. But can't do much with family. Apprenticeship for different jobs. Ok game.
Enjoying the game a lot, only thing is I am curious why my household expenses keep growing so rapidly even though I am not gaining any new members. what are the household expenses connected to?
replyContent: Thank you very much for your patronage and review. Household expenses rise as your children grow older and as you move up the social class ladder (it is a linear, per-person rise). They serve as an abstract representation of the living and luxury costs for the people in your household, please see https://rome.rangergo.net/on-household-expenses/

content: very repetitive
Well done, a good start. Gets a little repetitive after a while, but I hope that more features, events and choices are added in the future.

Very enjoyable game, i was however wondering if the developers were going to add war to the game in some way or form. After all, war is just as important as politics and religion were in ancient rome.

game was interesting for a bit but then just got stale and boring. there's not much to it just go by the months put your kids into apprenticeships and get education and then wait for you to die. fun for maybe an hour but not much longer

While a quality strategy and simulation game, full of historical research, it needs some tweaks to truly be great. Your family's income randomly decreases with no explanation whatsoever. If there's a drought, fine, tell me and reduce the income of the farms accordingly. Embargo? Sure, reduce the profit of my ships. But there are no explanations, and I end up on a treadmill with invisible controls which are randomly adjusted up and down which really decreases the strategy and the fun.
replyContent: Thank you for your patronage and for writing in. I am glad you're finding the game enjoyable overall. The fall in income is likely due to rising Household Expenses that go up as kids get older and you get richer & move up classes, please see http://rome.rangergo.net/on-household-expenses/ Please write to us at rome@thestartupengine.net Thank you!

content: Great game, devs care a lot! Reported a bug, devs got back to me quickly and politely!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your patronage and your review. We will be removing the influence and prestige decay in easy mode on the next update. Could you please elaborate on how insane a rate it is - don't 2-3 festivals an year make up for the decay? You can email us at rome@thestartupengine.net to help us balance it better. Thank you!

content: Gets boring fast. Please add more options.
Super fun! Totally worth the $4, right up my alley. Can't wait to watch it develop, I'll be playing this for a long while :D

A really interesting game that kept me entertained for a good hour trying to learn all the little history lessons packed into this simple game. Worth the $5, honestly. The photos show exactly what youi should expect.
It's all fine and dandy until your second son's wife births 6 children.
This game is very fun. Can get boring once you reach Senate class as its all about winning elections. Perhaps the developers can expand the election mechanics?

I enjoy this game considerably. I've only managed to get to the rank of Equites (I think they're called), and it's intriguing how some of my runs go considerably worse than others. Meanwhile, some times I'll run a surplus of 150 each month for a year, and it makes victory much more rewarding. My biggest criticism is the uncontrolled births. Unfortunately, Household costs make it extremely difficult at a certain stage. I also want to be able to choose which child I become.

Fun while rising. Very punitive on the fall. The biggest annoyance is that the game encourages you to have your children marry young. Younger married children means too many kids to the point where it is unmanageable. The game heavily taxes you while your kids are unmarried, and more kids mean less inheritance it is a really punishing game. The game should reduce the consequences of unmarried kids, choose which kids gets the inheritance, or be able to adopt kids, or increase property benefits.
good game needs more content

so I jut bought this yesterday, and I love it. played it for 5 hours straight without noticing. I will say the balancing is humbling however challenging. it's not hard to catch on to the game, however one bit of criticism. it seems that the interface for clicking the icons below the characters, doesn't actually show anything, not what it is or how it helps, etc.
Simple setup with a good amount to depth. I really hope there is more to come.
Any good guides out there? Advices? Forums where I can ask: What is the fastest way to make money? If I'm old is it worth sending my second son to school? *or questions like these
replyContent:
You can ask on the official Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/CitizenOfRome . We may introduce either a Wiki or a standalone forum if players are keen on it. See also: https://steamcommunity.com/app/1063790/discussions/
Thank you very much for your patronage and support!

content: Love it but... i really wish you had a diffaculty setting. i love how it is, but one bad year, your main guy dies, making you lose instantly 75%. i had a guy at class 1 with 11k in property, he died and his sons took everything, leaving the first born in finicial ruin as i am now losing 45$ with no way of paying it off but selling everything, losing education and going down to the lowest class. please find a way to balance this major flaw.

Really good game, love the roman history but I would love to see a bit more actual politics, such as enactments and/or laws etc and the ability to choose the next paterfamilias because sometimes your firstborn son has terrible stats. Nevertheless, it is an overall a great game and well-executed product of a great idea.

So far I really enjoy this game, but I think that it would really be cool if you could choose child takes over as patriarch when the family patriarch dies, also i think that it would be really cool if you could play through on a gameplay with cheats. Thank you for all the hard work that you put into making this game so, so very great!
pretty fun.. would like to see a divorce ability maybe it would cost influence to get one. this way you can have more kids with a younger wife

Not really much to this game. The event trivia is interesting but after that events are pretty much worthless. They offer only tiny amounts of influence that you lose shortly after. Influence is a worthless commodity since you always lose it faster than you gain it. As cost of living goes through the ceiling you wind up skipping festivals altogether. Mostly you just live poor and plummet down the social ladder.
replyContent: Thank you for your support and for writing in. Sorry you've had a difficult run. Our aim is to keep the game challenging and engaging but not punitive. I understand falling down classes can be rough but you bounce back quickly as children start working and get married. We're continuing to rebalance - Please see http://tiny.cc/svcp7y and email us

content: Neat little time killer. could use more events and different ones. Maybe Controls sometimes sluggish. (e.g. can't click "next month" when the are character-related pop-ups, can still scroll background view when an event pops up, etc.). also, seem to have hit the pinnacle very quickly... 1m+/month income, 2m prestige, 3m influence, all my male characters have been consuls multiple times ... what's left to do?
replyContent: Thank you very much for your support and input, I am glad you find the game enjoyable. In the latest update we have balanced the economics so that this racing up classes doesn't happen as easily. We are also working on more content at the Senate level The issue where the background scrolls instead of the event pop up should be fixed as well Thanks!

content: hope to see more events and stuff, still wish dead members would go to the bottom of their appropriate family section but it definitely isnt a deal breaker, lol.
replyContent: Glad you are enjoying it! Thank you very much for your support and input. We are looking into either making the automatic scroll to characters a setting or have small tappable icons pop up and fade out on the bottom right that will scroll you to the character with a new action available, so that the family tree is easier to navigate.

content: Amazing game, love Roman history and this is a nice way to learn new things! Keep up the amazing work
replyContent: Thank you very much! We're glad you're enjoying it :)

content: Very fun and addicting game! I would love a dark mode though.
replyContent:
Update: We now have a Dark Mode, you can enable it on the Settings screen on the latest version, thank you for your input
----
Glad you are enjoying it, and thank you for the input, we will definitely look into adding a Dark Mode

content: What a fantastic game.
replyContent: Glad you're enjoying it, thank you!
